item.title: Go RESTful API pt.1 - Simple HTTP Server
item.author: Author
item.description: This part 1 of building a Go RESTful API. Our final goal is to build up a CI/CD pipeline using the following tech stack. Wish me luck, nothing is easy in the beginning. ðŸ˜† * Go * GitLab -> Repository * GitLab -> CI/CD * PostgreSQL -> Cloud SQL * Docker * Kubernetes -> GKE In this part, we’re going to set up a simple HTTP server and local PostgreSQL.
